mapper.insert: insert into product (product_id, product_name, product_condition, product_price, product_description, img1, img2, img3, img4, product_category_id) values (#{productId}, #{productName}, #{productCondition}, #{productPrice}, #{productDescription}, #{img1}, #{img2}, #{img3}, #{img4}, #{productCategoryId})
mapper.select: SELECT product_id, product_name, product_condition, product_price, product_description, CONCAT_WS(',', IFNULL(img1, ''), IFNULL(img2, ''), IFNULL(img3, ''), IFNULL(img4, '')) as imgs, product_category_id FROM product

SELECT product_id, product_name, product_condition, product_price, product_description, CONCAT_WS(',', IFNULL(img1, ''), IFNULL(img2, ''), IFNULL(img3, ''), IFNULL(img4, '')) as imgs, product_category_id FROM product LIMIT #{param2} OFFSET #{param1}
